title: Development of WebQuest-Based Learning Objects for Architectural Design Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic architectural theory and experience in using CAD software
context.additional_context: Reflects learner characteristics (visual, sensory, active, and sequential learning tendencies). 86% lack practical experience in the design process, while 97.37% possess online information research skills

learning_goals: Students can apply the four stages of the architectural design process (problem definition, research, processing, synthesis) to real-world cases
Students can propose design solutions using digital tools (3D modeling, BIM software, etc.) through team-based webquest assignments
Students can establish design evaluation criteria and provide peer feedback through peer review
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
